import React from "react" import { useField } from "../hooks" const CreateNew = (props) => { const {reset: resetContent, ...content} = useField("text") const {reset: resetAuthor, ...author} = useField("text") const {reset: resetInfo, ...info} = useField("text") const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault() props.addNew({ content: content.value, author: author.value, info: info.value, votes: 0 }) } const handleReset = (e) =>{ e.preventDefault() resetContent() resetAuthor() resetInfo() } return (

create a new anecdote

content
author

) } export default CreateNew
